abstract.para: As &dapsacr; does not include any editor software, you are completely free in the choice of your XML editor. Basically, you can use any text editor, but it is helpful if the editor also supports editing XML in accordance with the DTD you use. A number of open source editors can be extended with plug-ins for automatic tag insertion and completion, insertion of xref elements or XML attributes and to check if the XML document is well-formed. Popular choices are vi, Emacs or jEdit.
